SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, report_ce_name, form_id, large_report, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, report_config_id FROM elp_report_config WHERE report_config_id = :report_config_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: Select rep.report_config_id, comp.code company, trans.translation report, rep.report_ce_name From elp_report_config rep, elp_form form, elp_dict_item_translation trans, elp_company comp Where form.form_id = rep.form_id AND trans.dict_item_id = form.dict_item_id AND comp.company_id = rep.company_id --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_in_clause Order by Upper(comp.code), Upper(trans.translation), Upper(rep.report_ce_name)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_report_config SET company_id = :company_id, report_ce_name = :report_ce_name, form_id = :form_id, large_report = :large_report, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE report_config_id = :report_config_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_report_config ( company_id, report_ce_name, form_id, large_report, created_by, report_config_id ) VALUES ( :company_id, :report_ce_name, :form_id, :large_report, :created_by, :report_config_id )
